attributes.action: Reintroduce the free vehicle m.o.t retest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The goverment recently stopped the free m.o.t retest for motor vehicle,s,thus preventing the d.i.y motorist from rectifying minor faults themselves.
These d.i.y motorists are now at the mercy of these m.o.t station,s with their high repair charges.
So log your vote now for the reintroduction of the free m.o.t test.
